    Package Description
    org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.layouting
    Contains all implementations of the graph layouting operator.
    org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.layouting.functions
    Contains all user defined functions related to graph-layouting
    org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.layouting.util
    Contains utility-classes related to graph-layouting
